DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine ABT-751 decrease tumor , determine long tumor shrinkage maintain patient breast cancer taxol taxotere . Patients receive ABT-751 mouth daily 21 day . Patients drug 7 day start next cycle drug .
DOC.brief_title: A Study ABT-751 Patients With Recurrent Breast Cancer After Taxane ( Taxol Taxotere ) Therapy .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Stage IIIB IV breast cancer . Recurrent tumor taxane therapy ( taxol taxotere ) . Able tolerate normal activity daily live . Adequate bone marrow , kidney liver function . Exclusion Criteria Pregnant breast feeding . No antitumor therapy ( include hormonal therapy Herceptin ) within 4 week start ABT751 administration .
